quote.name: Onișoară Rafael Emre
paragraphs: Crystal Logistics Services is a private company created with the goal of becoming a pillar for the development and automation of processes in transportation and logistics.

I started this business alone and wanted not only profit, but also a work environment based on values and a clear mission. My goal is to deliver premium services to clients at a fair cost, to be reliable consultants so that they receive exactly what they need for their businesses.
Our vision: implementing systems and automations that allow us to remain competitive and raise the industry standard.

fleet.title: OUR FLEET & PARTNER NETWORK
paragraphs: Daily capacity: 4000+ verified partners. We operate with our own fleet and an extensive network of financially and operationally validated carriers.
This means daily availability, multiple types of semi-trailers (tautliner, refrigerated, mega, vans), GPS monitoring, and document standardization.
The result: premium quality, fair costs, on-time delivery.
